full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZHING MCHOG BDE BA CAN DU THEG CHEN GYI RIGS SU SKYE BA 'DZIN PA'I RGYU'I TSOGS RNAMS NYAMS SU LEN PA'I TSUL DPAG BSAM LJON SHING ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @049A *, ,(CES ZHING MCHOG BDE BA CAN DU THEG CHEN GYI RIGS SU SKYE BA 'DZIN PA'I RGYU TSOGS RNAMS JI LTAR NYAMS SU LEN PA'I TSUL DPAG BSAM LJONGS SHING ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO'I BDE BA CAN GYI ZHING DU SKYE 'DZIN PA'I SMON LAM ZHING MCHOG SGO 'BYED GZHIR BZHAG NAS, SANGS RGYAS SNANG BA MTHA' YAS NGUR SMRIG GAR GYIS RNAM PAR ROL BA PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA RNAM PA GNYIS KYI GSUNG RAB RNAMS DANG, SKYABS MGON DAM PA LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJES MDZAD PAS MCHOG GSUM SPYI'I MCHOD CHOG YID BZHIN DBANG @049B RGYAL DANG, KHYAB BDAG 'KHOR LO'I MGON PO RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG NOR BU SHES RAB DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PAS BSKAL BZANG SANGS RGYAS STONG GI PHYAG MCHOD SMON LAM DANG BCAS PA BSOD NAMS KYI MYU GU 'PHEL BAR BYED PA'I BDUD RTZI'I CHAR CHEN RNAMS LAS TSIG 'GA' ZHIG BTUS TE, ZHING BKOD KYI MDO GNYIS DANG, BLA MA'I GSUNG LA BRTEN NAS DGE SLONG KUN RDOR MING CAN GYIS GZHAN LA PHAN DU RE BA'I BSAM PA DANG, PHYI MAR YANG ZHING MCHOG DER STON PA 'KHOR BCAS KYI ZHABS TRUNG DU SKYE BA'I RTEN 'BREL KHYAD PAR CAN BSGRIGS PA'I PHYIR DU ZIL MNON ZHES PA ME PHO RTA'I LOR SNYIGS DUS KYI 'GRO BA'I 'DREN MCHOG RJE BTZUN DAM PA BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO'I GRUB PA'I GNAS MCHOG SGRUB KHANG SHI PI THU'I DBEN GNAS SU BSGRIGS PA'I DGE BAS BDAG DANG 'GRO KUN LAM BZANG 'DI LA BRTEN NAS ZHING MCHOG BDE BA CAN DU MGON @050A *, ,PO 'OD DPAG MED KYI ZHABS DRUNG DU THEG CHEN GYI RIGS CAN DBANG PO RNON PO SHA STAG TU SKYE BAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
